attributes.action: put taxes on the houses of parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
HOW COME WE HAVE TO PAY TAX WHEN THE HOUSES OF PARLIAMENT DONT HAVE TO 

IF WE HAVE TO PAY SO SHOULD THEY !!!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read. Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
